com.tiberiuslabs.BattleChess.GameEngine

Class Rules

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tiberiuslabs.BattleChess.GameEngine.Rules

  • public final class Rules
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for verifying the legality of moves and recruitment, as well as determining whether a final state has been reached
    Author:
    Amandeep Gill

    • Method Detail

      • inBounds

        public static boolean inBounds(int x,
               int y)
        Checks if (x,y) is a valid tile location.
        Parameters:
        x - the column coordinate
        y - the row coordinate
        Returns:
        true if the location is valid, false otherwise

      • inBounds

        public static boolean inBounds(Position pos)
        Checks that pos(x,y) is a valid tile location. Performs null safety check
        Parameters:
        pos - the position to check
        Returns:
        true if the location is valid, false otherwise

      • isValidMove

        public static boolean isValidMove(Unit unit,
                  Position startPos,
                  Position finalPos,
                  GameBoard board)
        Checks that the attempted move is legal on a per-unit basis. Includes both attacking and normal moves
        Parameters:
        unit - the unit that the player is attempting to move, must not be null
        startPos - the starting position of the unit, must be a valid location (use inBounds to verify)
        finalPos - the desired final position of the unit, must be a valid location (use inBounds to verify)
        board - the current state of the game board, must not be null
        Returns:
        true if the move is valid, false otherwise

      • getValidMoves

        public static java.util.Set<Position> getValidMoves(Unit unit,
                                    Position startPos,
                                    GameBoard board)
        Get the set of all valid moves and attacks for the unit from the startPos
        Parameters:
        unit - the unit that the player is attempting to move, must not be null
        startPos - the starting position of the unit, must be a valid location (use inBounds to verify)
        board - the current state of the game board, must not be null
        Returns:
        the set containing all valid moves and attacks for the given unit at the given startPos

      • canRecruit

        public static boolean canRecruit(Color player,
                 Unit recruit,
                 Position position,
                 GameBoard board)
        Checks whether the player can recruit the given unit to the given position.

        Requirements for recruitment:

        • the recruit must be in the player's graveyard

        • the player must have an active monarch on one of the cities

        • the player must control their own capitol

        • the player must control at least 2 other cities
        Parameters:
        player - the player requesting recruitment
        recruit - the unit that the player wishes to recruit, must not be null
        position - the position to place the unit on
        board - the current state of the game board, must not be null
        Returns:
        true if the player can recruit the unit, false otherwise

      • winner

        public static Color winner(GameBoard board)
        Checks to see if either player has reached a win condition
        Parameters:
        board - the current state of the game board, must not be null
        Returns:
        the color of the winning player, NEUTRAL if neither player has won
